tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Gaurav Khera is a gift from God. He is a lovely combination of professionalism and care. My mother is 74 years old who suffered the B/L shoulder fracture in Winters. Keeping her age in mind, doctor gave the most appropriate treatment resulting which she has recovered so quickly. During the absence of one of his key support staff, he personally did the relevant test to avoid any delay and to comfort my mother. He treats elderly as his own. He is soft spoken and kind in nature. Dr. Khera, you are truly a remarkable doctor who we respect and trust. My mother's treatment was done with an honest approach and all the recommended medicines were well suited. I now know that I have a doctor whom I can trust with family. Thank you for everything and stay blessed, always.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: During the month of June 2020 amidst Covid-19, I consulted doctor for my grandmother of 80  age for Olecranon Fracture (Elbow). I was pleasantly surprised by the amount of time he gave during our first visit despite having a few other patients (and I saw him doing the same to other patients too in subsequent follow ups). He listened to all our queries patiently and was able to clear them. We found him quite reassuring and his staff at the clinic cooperative. We went ahead with the surgery process, his team made sure that all the arrangements were in place. The treatment was effective and smooth and she is doing fine now. I would recommend the doctor to everyone who can afford an above average cost of treatment (owing to slightly over priced post operative treatment in case of non-insured patients) and a hassle free high quality process.
reply_text:
Thanks for the appreciation Tushar . We do try to keep the costs down but certain costs like medicines cast  x-ray and hospital bills  have a limitation due to the basic costs . Will definitely try to work on the post operative expenses of the patients . A big thanks from the entire team for the kind words . Stay safe and stay healthy
Regards

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We didn't know that Dr Khera doesn't see patients in the morning at his clinic. But he readily agreed to treat my father in law (who had fallen down)on request since he was available there for a short time..just about to leave for hospital . He himself came to the car to examine him to avoid any kind of inconvenience to papa. He explained the problem n convinced us that there's nothing to worry about. ** ****  *** **** ********* * thanks to him papa is feeling much better now .

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
